verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: commuted] [ARG1: the sentence] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: of a woman serving a life sentence for drug offenses whose cause was championed by reality TV star Kim Kardashian West in a recent visit to the White House.</p >]

< p > President Donald Trump commuted the sentence Wednesday of [ARG0: a woman] [V: serving] [ARG1: a life sentence for drug offenses whose cause was championed by reality TV star Kim Kardashian] West in a recent visit to the White House.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump commuted the sentence Wednesday of a woman serving a life sentence for drug offenses whose cause [V: was] championed by reality TV star Kim Kardashian West in a recent visit to the White House.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump commuted the sentence Wednesday of a woman serving a life sentence for [ARG1: drug offenses] [R-ARG1: whose cause] was [V: championed] [ARG0: by reality TV star Kim Kardashian West] [ARGM-TMP: in a recent visit to the White House.</p] >
